title: Developing Instructional Design Practice Competencies through Collaborative Research Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic instructional design theories and research methodologies
context.additional_context: Project-based collaborative learning conducted in a BYOD environment, including learners from multicultural backgrounds.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze the complexities that arise during the instructional design research process.
Learners can propose solutions to real-world instructional design problems by utilizing collaborative research methods.
Learners can effectively communicate and share research findings with members from diverse cultural backgrounds.
Learners can demonstrate practical instructional design experiences through project-based assessments with concrete and measurable deliverables.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
